actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to convey certain lands to D-Q University in fee simple absolute.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to convey specified lands in the county of Yolo, California, to D-Q University in fee simple absolute.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to convey certain lands to D-Q University in fee simple absolute.
